Package org.rdkit.knime.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Callback
    This interface is intended to be implemented by in-line code that shall be called asynchronously after a certain task has been completed.
    FilterCondition
    This interface can be implemented to express a filter condition.
    RDKitAdapterCellSupport.DataCellTypeConverterFactory
    Interface to be implemented when converters register for adapter cell support.
    RDKitObjectCleaner
    This interface defines methods to register RDKit objects, which are subject of later cleanup.
    SplitCondition
    This interface can be implemented to express split conditions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChemUtils
    This class provides chemistry related utility functions.
    DialogComponentColumnNameSelection
    Provides a standard component for a dialog that allows to select a column in a given org.knime.core.data.DataTableSpec.
    DialogComponentEnumButtonGroup<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    A standard component to display radio buttons.
    DialogComponentEnumFilterPanel<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    This component has similar functionality as the column filter panel.
    DialogComponentEnumSelection<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    Provides a standard component for a dialog that allows to select an enumeration value.
    DialogComponentSeparator
    Provides a component with a separator.
    DialogComponentTable  
    EclipseUtils
    This class contains utility methods to work with Eclipse functionality.
    FileUtils
    This utility class contains convenience methods to work with file data.
    FilterCondition.ExcludeMissingCell
    For convenience reasons this filter is provided to filter out rows that contain empty cells in a certain column.
    GenericListModel<T>
    A typed list model.
    HiddenSettingComponent
    Provides a standard component for a dialog, which is hidden and cannot be changed by the user.
    HorizontalCompoundIcon Deprecated
    Deprecated and replaced by RDKit Types Plugin class org.rdkit.knime.headers.HorizontalCompoundIcon.
    InputDataInfo
    Makes information available for easy access of input data required for node execution.
    LayoutUtils
    This class offers a collection of static utility methods for laying out and formatting components.
    MultiSelectionListPanel
    A multi-selection list combining a list, a scrollbar and two buttons to select all or none.
    PreferenceButton
    An abstract field editor for a string type preference that presents a string input field with a change button to its right to edit the input field's content.
    RandomAccessRowIterator
    This class iterates over the rows of a DataTable and is capable of jumping ahead to absolute row indices.
    RDKitAdapterCellSupport
    This class defines for the RDKit, which data types are compatible with each other and what type converters exist.
    SafeGuardedResource<T>
    A safe guarded resource shields a resource from unauthorized thread access.
    SettingsModelEnumeration<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    This class stores an enumeration based setting.
    SettingsModelEnumerationArray<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    This class stores a setting with an array of enumeration values.
    SettingsUtils
    This class offers several utility methods to deal with KNIME settings objects.
    SpinnerEditor
    This class is used for handling the spinner characteristics for a number to be edited in a table cell.
    SplitCondition.SplitMissingCell
    For convenience reasons this splitter is provided to split rows containing missing cells in a particular column to a second table.
    StringUtils
    This utility class contains convenience methods to work with strings.
    SystemUtils
    This utility class contains convenience methods to detect and use functionality of operating systems.
    TableCellAction
    A table cell editor implementation for invoking an action.
    TableColorCellEditor
    A table cell editor for colors.
    VerticalCompoundIcon Deprecated
    Deprecated and replaced by RDKit Types Plugin class org.rdkit.knime.headers.VerticalCompoundIcon.
    WarningConsolidator
    This class gathers warnings from different situations and produces on request a summary warning message taking into account how often a warning occurred and in what context it occurred.
    WarningConsolidator.Context
    A context consists of an id, a name (e.g. row) and a plural name (e.g. rows) and is used to separate warnings and assign them to specific contexts, e.g.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InputDataInfo.EmptyCellPolicy
    This enumeration defines policies for handling of empty cells when the value of a cell is requested from an InputDataInfo object.
    MultiSelectionListPanel.SortDirection
    Defines sorting directions.
    SafeGuardedResource.LifeCycleState
    The life cycle state consists of three states.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InputDataInfo.EmptyCellException
    This exception is thrown, when an empty cell was encountered during processing, which had an Empty Cell Policy DeliverEmptyValue or StopExecution assigned.
    InvalidInputException
    This exception can be used if input cells are encountered that are invalid in the context of a node and cannot be processed.
